product_name: Black Diamond Positron Quickpack Quickdraw Set - Package of 6
long_description: Load up with this Black Diamond Positron Quickpack quickdraw set and head out to the crag. Straight gate Positron carabiners on top and bent gate Positron carabiners on bottom are linked by 14mm-wide Dynex dogbone runners, creating quickdraws that are easy to clip. Positron carabiners have keylock noses that won't snag on webbing or bolt hangers. Rubber Straitjacket(TM) inserts in runner loops keep the bent gate carabiners in proper orientation for easier and more efficient clipping. The Black Diamond Positron Quickpack quickdraw set comes with dogbone runners that are 12cm long. Package of 6.
short_description: Load up with this Black Diamond Positron Quickpack quickdraw set and head out to the crag.
